metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14697 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
musl libc through 1.1.23 has an x87 floating-point stack adjustmentimbalance, related to the math/i386/ directory. In some cases, use of thislibrary could introduce out-of-bounds writes that are not present in anapplication's source code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

musl - 0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
musl-tools - 0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: musl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
